pages.about-us: About GoDelivery - Your Trusted Delivery Partner GoDelivery HOME ABOUT US SERVICES CONTACT About Us GoDelivery has been a leader in the logistics and delivery industry since its inception. Our mission is to provide fast, reliable, and efficient delivery services that meet the needs of businesses and individuals alike. We leverage the latest technology and a dedicated team to ensure your packages are delivered on time, every time. We pride ourselves on our collaborative approach, working closely with our clients to understand their unique requirements and deliver tailored solutions. Our commitment to excellence has earned us the trust and respect of our customers. From strategic planning to execution, our comprehensive services cover all aspects of delivery logistics. We bring a wealth of expertise and a customer-centric mindset to every project, ensuring that we exceed expectations and drive success for our clients. "Experience unmatched delivery excellence." Our team comprises experienced professionals from various backgrounds, including logistics experts, customer service specialists, and innovative tech professionals. This diverse expertise allows us to offer unparalleled service and innovative solutions. Our headquarters are located in the bustling city of New York, with operations extending to multiple national and international locations. Every member of our 105-strong team is committed to ensuring that GoDelivery continues to set the standard in the delivery services industry. Can We Introduce Ourselves? GoDelivery is your trusted partner in ensuring that packages reach their destination swiftly and safely. Our dedicated team and cutting-edge logistics technology work tirelessly to provide top-notch delivery solutions tailored to your needs. We believe in excellence and efficiency in every delivery. Many Roles, One Mission: Excellence. At GoDelivery, we offer a dynamic range of roles that provide opportunities for growth and development. Our commitment to your career advancement is matched only by our commitment to reliable service. Whether you're part of our logistics, customer service, or tech team, you'll find a place to thrive and make a difference. Comfort Fuels Creativity. We believe that a comfortable and supportive work environment is the key to innovation and creativity. At GoDelivery, titles matter less than the passion and ideas you bring to the table. We offer flexible career paths tailored to your aspirations, ensuring you can achieve your personal and professional goals while contributing to our success. Get to Know Us Join GoDelivery. Exciting projects, a supportive corporate culture, and inspiring colleagues - sound good? Our Services Delivery Events The Future of Delivery Services! Are you interested in the latest innovations in the delivery industry? Join us on these dates to meet our team and learn about cutting-edge delivery solutions and trends shaping the future of logistics. June 15, 2024 Logistics Expo - Secure your spot at the Logistics Expo and visit our booth to engage with our experts and explore our advanced delivery services, Convention Center, New York Explore All Delivery Services Get to Know Us Curious about how we ensure your deliveries are fast and reliable? Learn about our team, our processes, and what goes into making every delivery seamless. The GoDelivery website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline GoDelivery Legal Notices Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions

Want to experience the best in delivery services? Get in touch with us today! Get in Touch About Us GoDelivery has been a leader in the logistics and delivery industry since its inception. Our mission is to provide fast, reliable, and efficient delivery services that meet the needs of businesses and individuals alike. We leverage the latest technology and a dedicated team to ensure your packages are delivered on time, every time. We pride ourselves on our collaborative approach, working closely with our clients to understand their unique requirements and deliver tailored solutions. Our commitment to excellence has earned us the trust and respect of our customers. From strategic planning to execution, our comprehensive services cover all aspects of delivery logistics. We bring a wealth of expertise and a customer-centric mindset to every project, ensuring that we exceed expectations and drive success for our clients. "Experience unmatched delivery excellence." Our team comprises experienced professionals from various backgrounds, including logistics experts, customer service specialists, and innovative tech professionals. This diverse expertise allows us to offer unparalleled service and innovative solutions. Our headquarters are located in the bustling city of New York, with operations extending to multiple national and international locations. Every member of our 105-strong team is committed to ensuring that GoDelivery continues to set the standard in the delivery services industry. Our Delivery Services Same-Day Delivery We offer reliable same-day delivery services to ensure your urgent packages reach their destination on time. Express Shipping Our express shipping service guarantees fast and efficient delivery for time-sensitive shipments. Scheduled Deliveries We provide scheduled delivery options to meet your specific timing requirements and ensure flexibility. International Shipping Our international shipping services make it easy to send packages across borders with reliable tracking and timely delivery. E-commerce Solutions We offer tailored delivery solutions for e-commerce businesses, ensuring seamless order fulfillment and customer satisfaction. Freight Services Our freight services cater to larger shipments, providing reliable and efficient transport for bulk goods. Join Us and Be a Part of It! There are plenty of reasons to join us: engaging tasks, satisfaction in delivering excellent service, and unique career opportunities are just a few. "Shape the future of delivery services with us - we invite you: Get to Know Us!" Alex & Jamie, CEOs Delivery isn't a leisure activity Efficiency Unleashed. What's Your Requirement? pages.privacy-policy: GoDelivery Privacy Policy - Protecting Your Personal Information GoDelivery HOME ABOUT US SERVICES CONTACT Privacy Policy Your privacy is important to us. It is GoDelivery's policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website and other sites we own and operate. We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used. We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification. We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law. Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy policies. You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired services. Your continued use of our website will be regarded as acceptance of our practices around privacy and personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, feel free to contact us. This policy is effective as of 1 January 2025. The GoDelivery website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline GoDelivery Legal Notices Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions

pages.terms-conditions: GoDelivery Terms and Conditions - Rules for Using Our Delivery Services GoDelivery HOME ABOUT US SERVICES CONTACT GoDelivery Terms and Conditions Welcome to GoDelivery! These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the GoDElivery website and services ("Services"). By accessing or using the Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the Terms, you may not access or use the Services. 1. Use of Services You may only use the Services for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to use the Services: In any way that violates any applicable law or regulation. To infringe on the rights of any third party, including intellectual property rights. To transmit any material that is harmful, threatening, abusive, harassing, defamatory, vulgar, obscene, hateful, or racially or ethnically offensive. To interfere with or disrupt the Services or any servers or networks connected to the Services. To attempt to gain unauthorized access to the Services, any other accounts, computer systems or networks connected to the Services, or any information stored on or through the Services. 2. User Accounts You may be required to create an account to access certain features of the Services. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information, including your password. You are also responsible for all activities that occur under your account. 3. Content The Services may contain content ("Content") owned by GoDElivery or third parties. You may not modify, copy, distribute, transmit, display, perform, reproduce, publish, license, create derivative works from, or otherwise exploit any Content, except as expressly permitted by these Terms. 4. Disclaimer of Warranties THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. GoDElivery DOES NOT WARRANT THAT THE SERVICES WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, SECURE, OR ERROR-FREE. 5. Limitation of Liability IN NO EVENT SHALL GoDElivery, ITS OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, OR AGENTS BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO YOUR USE OF THE SERVICES, EVEN IF GoDElivery HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. 6. Termination GoDElivery may terminate your access to the Services at any time, for any reason, with or without notice. You may also terminate your access to the Services at any time. 7. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of , without regard to its conflict of laws provisions. 8. Entire Agreement These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and GoDElivery with respect to the use of the Services and supersede all prior or contemporaneous communications and proposals, whether oral or written. 9. Changes to Terms GoDElivery reserves the right to change these Terms at any time. The revised Terms will be effective immediately upon posting on the Services. Your continued use of the Services following the posting of revised Terms means that you accept and agree to the changes.
